entries.name: Listbox

members.name: id
members.description: A unique identifier for the listbox.

members.name: element
members.description: A reference to the host element.

members.name: textDirection
members.description: A signal wrapper for directionality.

members.name: items
members.description: The Option UIPatterns of the child Options.

members.name: orientation
members.description: Whether the list is vertically or horizontally oriented.

members.name: multi
members.description: Whether multiple items in the list can be selected at once.

members.name: wrap
members.description: Whether focus should wrap when navigating.

members.name: softDisabled
members.description:
Whether to allow disabled items to receive focus. When `true`, disabled items are
focusable but not interactive. When `false`, disabled items are skipped during navigation.

members.name: focusMode
members.description:
The focus strategy used by the list.
- `roving`: Focus is moved to the active item using `tabindex`.
- `activedescendant`: Focus remains on the listbox container, and `aria-activedescendant` is used to indicate the active item.

members.name: selectionMode
members.description:
The selection strategy used by the list.
- `follow`: The focused item is automatically selected.
- `explicit`: Items are selected explicitly by the user (e.g., via click or spacebar).

members.name: typeaheadDelay
members.description: The amount of time before the typeahead search is reset.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether the listbox is disabled.

members.name: readonly
members.description: Whether the listbox is readonly.

members.name: values
members.description: The values of the currently selected items.

members.name: gotoFirst

signatures.name: gotoFirst
signatures.description: Navigates to the first item in the listbox.
signatures.rawComment: /** Navigates to the first item in the listbox. */

implementation.name: gotoFirst
implementation.description: Navigates to the first item in the listbox.
implementation.rawComment: /** Navigates to the first item in the listbox. */

members.description: Navigates to the first item in the listbox.
members.rawComment: /** Navigates to the first item in the listbox. */

entries.rawComment:
/** * Represents a container used to display a list of items for a user to select from. * * The `ngListbox` is meant to be used in conjunction with `ngOption` directives to create a * selectable list. It supports single and multiple selection modes, as well as various focus and * orientation strategies. * * ```html *
    * @for (item of items; track item.id) { *
  • * {{item.name}} *
    • * } *
* ``` * * @developerPreview 21.0 */

entries.name: Option

members.name: element
members.description: A reference to the host element.

members.name: active
members.description: Whether the option is currently active (focused).

members.name: id
members.description: A unique identifier for the option.

members.name: searchTerm
members.description: The text used by the typeahead search.

members.name: value
members.description: The value of the option.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Whether an item is disabled.

members.name: label
members.description: The text used by the typeahead search.

members.name: selected
members.description: Whether the option is selected.

entries.description:
A selectable option in an `ngListbox`. This directive should be applied to an element (e.g., `
  • `, `
    `) within an `ngListbox`. The `value` input is used to identify the option, and the `label` input provides the accessible name for the option. ```html
  • Item Name
    • ```
